strategy: Replace the neural network with a gradient boosting ensemble (e.g., LightGBM or XGBoost) using tree-based models with deep trees (up to 10 levels) and enable histogram-based binning for categorical features. Apply target encoding with smoothing (e.g., lambda = 0.1) and perform recursive feature elimination (RFE) using a tree-based model to select top 50% of features. Introduce temporal splits with a 6-month gap between training and testing to ensure robustness to time drift. Use a weighted composite loss that penalizes large residuals more heavily with a scaled L1 term to improve stability in volatile periods.

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, RecursiveFeatureElimination
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, TargetEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Prepare features and target
X = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y = train_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values
X[numerical_columns] = X[numerical_columns].fillna(X[numerical_columns].median())
X[categorical_columns] = X[categorical_columns].fillna(X[categorical_columns].mode().iloc[0])

# Target encoding with smoothing (lambda = 0.1)
target_encoder = TargetEncoder(smoothing=0.1)
X_encoded = target_encoder.fit_transform(X[categorical_columns], y)
X_encoded_df = pd.DataFrame(X_encoded, columns=categorical_columns)

# Combine with numerical features
X_final = pd.concat([X[numerical_columns], X_encoded_df], axis=1)

# Prepare test data
test_X = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
test_X[numerical_columns] = test_X[numerical_columns].fillna(test_X[numerical_columns].median())
test_X[categorical_columns] = test_X[categorical_columns].fillna(test_X[categorical_columns].mode().iloc[0])

test_X_encoded = target_encoder.transform(test_X[categorical_columns])
test_X_encoded_df = pd.DataFrame(test_X_encoded, columns=categorical_columns)

test_X_final = pd.concat([test_X[numerical_columns], test_X_encoded_df], axis=1)

# Recursive Feature Elimination with Gradient Boosting
rfe = RecursiveFeatureElimination(
    estimator=GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators=100, max_depth=10, learning_rate=0.05, random_state=42),
    n_fea

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.feature_selection import RFE
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Prepare features and target
X = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y = train_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values
X[numerical_columns] = X[numerical_columns].fillna(X[numerical_columns].median())
X[categorical_columns] = X[categorical_columns].fillna(X[categorical_columns].mode().iloc[0])

# One-hot encode categorical features
encoder = OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore', drop='first', sparse_output=False)
X_encoded = encoder.fit_transform(X[categorical_columns])
X_encoded_df = pd.DataFrame(X_encoded, columns=encoder.get_feature_names_out(categorical_columns))

# Combine with numerical features
X_final = pd.concat([X[numerical_columns], X_encoded_df], axis=1)

# Prepare test data
test_X = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
test_X[numerical_columns] = test_X[numerical_columns].fillna(test_X[numerical_columns].median())
test_X[categorical_columns] = test_X[categorical_columns].fillna(test_X[categorical_columns].mode().iloc[0])

test_X_encoded = encoder.transform(test_X[categorical_columns])
test_X_encoded_df = pd.DataFrame(test_X_encoded, columns=encoder.get_feature_names_out(categorical_columns))

test_X_final = pd.concat([test_X[numerical_columns], test_X_encoded_df], axis=1)

# Recursive Feature Elimination with Gradient Boosting
rfe = RFE(
    estimator=GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators=100, max_depth=10,
